meanings.definition: Skill or adroitness in using the hands or body.
meanings.sent1: Her dexterousnesses in knitting amazed everyone at the craft fair.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon's dexterousnesses in the operating room saved many lives.
meanings.sent3: His dexterousnesses with a basketball made him the star player of the team.
meanings.sent4: The artist's dexterousnesses with a paintbrush turned a blank canvas into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The chef's dexterousnesses in the kitchen were evident in the beautifully plated dishes.

meanings.sent1: Her dexterousnesses in solving puzzles impressed her classmates.
meanings.sent2: The detective's dexterousnesses in solving cases made him famous.
meanings.sent3: His dexterousnesses in coming up with excuses always got him out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: The lawyer's dexterousnesses in arguments won him many court cases.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's dexterousnesses in explaining complex topics made learning easy for students.
